patthana23.48:4.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ naācayagāmiṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho ācayagāmī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.48:5.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ naapacayagāmiṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho apacayagāmī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.48:6.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nanevācayagāmināpacayagāmiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho nevācayagāmināpacayagāmī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.48:6.3: Hetuyā ekavīsa, adhipatiyā ekavīsa … pe … avigate ekavīsa.
